subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan's Capital and Other Princely States
question_en: Which was the capital of Rajasthan during the rule of the Maharanas of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवार्नाओं के वर्षण के समय राजस्थान के राजधानी क्या था?
explanation_en:
Udaipur was the capital of Rajasthan during the rule of the Maharanas of Mewar.

मेवार्नाओं के वर्षण के समय राजस्थान के राजधानी क्या था?
explanation_hi: मेवार्नाओं के वर्षण के समय राजस्थान के राजधानी क्या था?

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which festival is celebrated in Rajasthan with the purpose of welcoming the rains?
question_hi: राजस्थान में महिलें में हैं, यह प्रदेश अलगत क्या है।
explanation_en: The Kite Festival, also known as Udaipur, is celebrated in Rajasthan to welcome the rains.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में राखी के लिए बन्नता करने के लिए उद्यापुर फेस्ट
राजस्थान में राखी के लिए बन्नता करने के लिए उद्यापुर फेस्ट

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which legend is associated with the Padmini's kidnapping in Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चट्टोगर्ह के पैदिया के जमनकरने के लिए पेट्स्ट
explanation_en:
The legend of Rana Kumbha is associated with the kidnapping of Padmini in Chittorgarh Fort.

चटोर फॉट
explanation_hi: पातिकर कुम्भा का मैंग के संग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which festival is celebrated to mark the beginning of the Rajasthani culture?
explanation_en: The Surajgarh Fair marks the beginning of the Rajasthani culture.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the largest desert in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: The Thar Desert, also known as Kumbhal, is the largest desert in Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which forts were built during the rule of Rana Kumbhal?
explanation_en: During the rule of Rana Kumbhal, Amber Fort and Meera Kumbha were built in Jaipur.
